TELiX MSG: 62A64 28/08/24 08:13 +03:00
JOIN MARITIME INC. - GREECE - TEL:+30 210 9850800 - FAX:+30 210 9844801
E-MAIL : chartering@joinmaritime.com
-/MF
GD DAY
PLS PPOSE FOR BELOW LOCAL HANDY
OPEN RIZHAO 1-5 SEPT
---------------------
MV 'CS CALLA'
-------------
FLAG/BUILT/TYPE - BAHAMAS/2011/ SINGLEDECK/BULK CARRIERS
CLASS   - LLOYDS
DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT - ABT 37482.20 MT/10.4 M SSW
LOA/BEAM/ TPC - 189.99M/28.5 M/50.1MT ON SSW
INT. GR/NT - 24065 / 12148
ICE CLASS - 1C / CO2 FITTED / A60 BULKHEAD / AWWF HOLD LADDER FITTED
5HOLDS/HATCHES/HYDRAULIC FOLDING/NATURAL VENTILATION   4 X 30 METRIC TONNES
CRANES
CUBIC BREAKDOWN   GRAIN/BALE CU.M    48,934.39 CU MTRS   47,848.41 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H1    7,587.79                7,483.80 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H2   10,760.84               10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H3   10,760.84               10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H4   10,760.84               10,490.08 CU MTRS
GRAIN/BALE CU.M - H5    9,064.08                8,894.37 CU MTRS
SPEED/CONS
ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION               ABT 11.5 KTS/ABT 19.7MT (L)    ABT 12.0 KTS/ABT
19.7MT (B) VLSFO
EEXI SPEED/CONSUPTION                ABT 13.4KTS/ABT 22.7MT (L)      ABT 13.4 KTS/
ABT 21.7MT (B) VLSFO
AN ADD. QTTY OF 0.2 MT MDO/DAY AS PER PRACTICE FOR FO CHANGE OVER, GENERATOR
STARTING, INCINERATOR, BOILER, ETC.
AT PORTCONDITION IDLE   ABT 2.5MT VLSFO
AT PORTCONDITION WORKING (24HRS) ABT4.5 MT VLSFO
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE GIVEN BASIS UP TO BEAUFORT 4, NO ADVERSE CURRENT
AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3. VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO USE MDO FOR MANOEUVRING IN
NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS
AND ADVERSE WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR IS ON LOW LOAD. VESSEL ALSO HAS
LIBERTY TO USE MDO/MGO IN HER MAIN, AUXILIARY ENGINES & BOILER WHEN REQUIRED
BY LOCAL REGULATIONS. "ABT" TO BE -0.5KTS FOR SPEED AND +5% FOR FUEL
CONSUMPTION. BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO
SPECIFICATIONS:VLSFO: ISO 8217: 2005 ISO-F-RMG 380 MDO: ISO 8217:2005 ISO-F
DMC SULPHUR CONTENT NOT EXCEEDING 1.5% STATUTORY LIMIT OUTSIDE ECA FOR MAIN
ENGINE, GENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER. LSGO: ISO 8217:2010 ISO-F DMA MAX. 0.1%
SULPHUR CONTENT FOR MAIN ENGINE, ENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER WHILE IN ECA.
BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO SPECIFICATIONS:VLSFO: ISO 8217:
2005 ISO-F-RMG 380 MDO: ISO 8217:2005 ISO-F DMC SULPHUR CONTENT NOT EXCEEDING
1.5% STATUTORY LIMIT OUTSIDE ECA FOR MAIN ENGINE, GENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER.
LSGO: ISO 8217:2010 ISO-F DMA MAX. 0.1% SULPHUR CONTENT FOR MAIN ENGINE,
ENERATOR ENGINE AND BOILER WHILE IN ECA.
NO MIXING OF VLSFO BUNKERS ALLOWED BUT MIXING OF LSMGO BUNKERS PERMITTED.
ALL FIGURES OR DETS ABT
AW YRS
BRGDS
MICHAEL FLOROS
JOIN MARITIME INC.
MOBILE: +30 6942 556 220
SKYPE: M_FLOROS
